scripts.offline:debug:global: node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 $(npm config get prefix)/bin/sls offline start

scriptsDescriptions.EXPLANATION: dummy object only used to comment built scripts(will be ignored by npm)
scriptsDescriptions.sls: alias for serverless command(further command will be applied. E.g: npm run sls deploy -- --stage local ...)
scriptsDescriptions.serverless: alias for serverless command(further command will be applied. E.g: npm run serverless deploy -- --stage local ...)
scriptsDescriptions.offline:debug:global: [DEPRECATED:USE LOCAL NPM BIN] script used to start serverless offline with docker-compatible vscode debugger(Referencing global node_modules bin)
scriptsDescriptions.offline:debug: script used to start serverless offline with docker-compatible vscode debugger(Referencing local node_modules bin)
scriptsDescriptions.wipe: script used to easly wipe temporary files
